item.title: Mindy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Stephanie Klein
item.description: "Stop caring what other people think. How? Understand that this is your life, not theirs, and you'll have no one to blame but yourself if things don't work out the way you'd hoped...their opinion shouldn't matter more than your own." -- Stephanie Klein

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Stephanie Klein
item.description: "Don't be so damn hard on yourself. Yeah, you screwed up. You're not perfect, fine. Learn from it. But don't punish yourself. Be kind to you, even when you screw up. You'll bounce back eventually. You'll make up for it." -- Stephanie Klein

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "This is not a novel to be tossed aside lightly. It should be thrown with great force." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I don't know much about being a millionaire, but I'll bet I'd be darling at it." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "That would be a good thing for them to cut on my tombstone: Wherever she went, including here, it was against her better judgment." -- Dorothy Parker
